result.eng: Put those things in order according to size.
result.ga: Cuir na rudaí sin in ord de réir méide
result.orig: Cuir na rudaí sin in ord de réir méide
result.html: Cuir na rudaí sin in ord de réir méidePut those things in order according to size.
result.ponchtml: Cuir na rudaí sin in ord de réir méidePut those things in order according to size.

result.eng: We will dispatch your order within three working days.
result.ga: Cuirfimid d'ordú chun bealaigh laistigh de thrí lá oibre
result.orig: Cuirfimid d'ordú chun bealaigh laistigh de thrí lá oibre
result.html: Cuirfimid d'ordú chun bealaigh laistigh de thrí lá oibreWe will dispatch your order within three working days.
result.ponchtml: Cuirfimid d'ordú ċun bealaiġ laistiġ de ṫrí lá oibreWe will dispatch your order within three working days.

result.eng: We got an order from the general.
result.html: Fuair muid ordú ón ghinearálWe got an order from the general.
result.ponchtml: Fuair muid ordú ón ġinearálWe got an order from the general.

result.eng: The phone is out of order.
result.html: Tá an fón as ordThe phone is out of order.
result.ponchtml: Tá an fón as ordThe phone is out of order.
